description.name: MaxMind
description.tagline: Detect Online Fraud and Locate Online Visitors.
description.long: Prevent online fraud, cut chargebacks, and reduce manual review using MaxMind's services.
features: Simplify order review with detailed user insights
Supports real-time risk scoring and contextual and reputational data
Build rules and feed your risk models with over 50 data points
Support for minFraud Score, Insights and Factors
